about_the_game:
Dress up your character as Micah or Shara from Rune Factory 3.

"Shara's Outfit" can only be worn by the female protagonist.

"Micah's Outfit" can only be worn by the male protagonist.

Additional outfits can be selected from the wardrobe in your character's bedroom.
detailed_description:
Dress up your character as Micah or Shara from Rune Factory 3.

"Shara's Outfit" can only be worn by the female protagonist.

"Micah's Outfit" can only be worn by the male protagonist.

Additional outfits can be selected from the wardrobe in your character's bedroom.
